body:
Well What's up?
Anyone wanna join the Nub Club!?
It's free fun and just plain out nubby!!
Members: kammy878, PeachyYas, irex681 Maniacmagee, Luke997096, Centeralking, PsychoStoner, buster_U, Craft_Sem, bmbrocks321, zaidms0987, Creeper Experte, OverlordJohn, HoboMaddy, EliBass, EliDanco, bluewhale1, AdrianG503, fazer153, cinammoncroc000, NuclearDucky, slicorn, Thecalined, Creeperjoe62                                                                                                                                  If you want to join you can reply and the requirements are:
You Have to admit you are a Nub 
You should try to speak Nub-Latin (just say stuff with nub in the sentence
You should call others in the nub club NUBS
Peachy and i are thinking  of making an optional skin for the nub club 
We might also have a nub war!
We would also like to ask to spread the Nub Club
The Leader of the Nub Club is kammy878
You are welcome to JOIN!!! 
And AMA about the club or just comment.
We will also take suggestions!! SO JOIN NOW!!!
BTW this is a fun club just for fun. We do not want to make fun of anyone or anything of that sort. It isnt intended to hurt anyone. i just wanted to make that clear.
